title: Projectile Motion - graph of speed as a function

content.description: An object is launched into the air with an initial velocity <math alttext="v sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>v</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math> at an angle above the horizontal as shown.
content.question: Which of the following graphs best represents the speed of the object as a function of time?

choices.label: The figure shows the graph of a curve in the plane with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled Time. The vertical axis is labeled Speed and the value v sub 0 is indicated. The line begins at v sub 0 and it arcs down the graph slightly and then back up ending to the right of v sub 0.

The figure shows the graph of a curve in the plane with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled Time. The vertical axis is labeled Speed and the value v sub 0 is indicated. The line begins at v sub 0 and it arcs down until it reaches the horizontal axis at the midpoint and then arcs back up and ends to the right of v sub 0.

The figure shows the graph of a two line segments in the plane with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled Time. The vertical axis is labeled Speed and the value v sub 0 is indicated. The first line segment begins at v sub 0 and moves down to a point above the halfway point on the horizontal axis. The next line segment starts where the first ended and moves up and to the right and ends to the right of v sub 0.

The figure shows the graph of a two line segments in the plane with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled Time. The vertical axis is labeled Speed and the value v sub 0 is indicated. The first line segment begins at v sub 0 and moves steeply down to the halfway point on the horizontal axis. The next line segment starts where the first ended and moves steeply up and to the right and ends to the right of v sub 0.

content.answer: The figure shows the graph of a curve in the plane with the origin labeled O. The horizontal axis is labeled Time. The vertical axis is labeled Speed and the value v sub 0 is indicated. The line begins at v sub 0 and it arcs down the graph slightly and then back up ending to the right of v sub 0.
